title: PricingMessage
description: Schema for a pricing message in the simulated exchange

sequenceNumber.description: Monotonically increasing sequence number for the message

currency.description: The currency of the price (e.g., USD, EUR)

venue.description: The exchange or venue where the price originated

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the price was generated

bidOffer.description: Indicates if the price is a bid or an offer

quantity.description: The quantity available at this price
